LHIS.TA.summary: Lachish Industries Ltd. manufactures and sells cattle feeding machinery in Israel. The company offers products, such as self-propellers, vertical trailers, stationery mixers, and delivery trucks. It sells its products for dairy farming and feedlot industry under the RMH brand. The company was founded in 1956 and is based in Sderot, Israel.

ROO.AX.summary: Roots Sustainable Agricultural Technologies Ltd. operates as an agriculture technology company in Israel. It focuses on developing, producing, and commercializing precision agriculture technologies that address difficult weather conditions, enhance crop yields, and provide water for irrigation. The company offers drip and temperature control (D-RZTO) system, root zone temperature optimization (RZTO) system, and irrigation by condensation (IBC)system. Roots Sustainable Agricultural Technologies Ltd. was incorporated in 2009 and is based in Kfar Vitkin, Israel.
